revised_title: Integral Equation Method for Fluid Motion Due to Cylinder Heaving on Water
tldr: The article presents an integral equation method for determining the fluid motion of a partially submerged cylinder oscillating on water of finite depth. The method uses Green's theorem and a fundamental solution to obtain an integral equation for the potential on the cylinder. The numerical results are in good agreement with the method of multipoles, which is more efficient for circular shapes but not applicable to other sections.
